# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

<!-- run-disable -->

```javascript
console.log( 'HERE!' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

<!-- run-disable -->

```javascript
console.log( 'BEEP!' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
